title: @ riot Permaban for this. Please read carefully in light of what I got because of it.
body:
Why do the good have to die young?
So I got permabanned for this. Its not nice by any means but it doesnt justify being permabanned. I got told to kill myself that Im garbage etc ( all of which are 100 times more severe than this). So riot go review this case to take at look at wht they wrote and tell me this is fair. Often they would tell me that we lose cos Im trash jungle which led me to reply that they got outclassed by their respective laners. ( sorry this isnt worth a permaban). I dont want to ruin other peoples games on other accounts smurfin if I have to its fine. If this was deserved I would accept it right away but its not as I said. I urge you to think about the implications of what I wrote, its no restriction its a permanent ban keep that in mind. So here it is. COmpare this to what other people write in your games, apart from 1 game this isnt that bad.
So Ima give some context too, because they way theyre doing this is very misleading and makes it look as though I was talking to no one here.
Game 1 : While I admit its not nice its not worth a ban. Simply calling the enemy better than own laners isnt worth a permaban. In this game I got called "retarded monkey" and obviously blamed for the loss as a whole.
Game 2 : In this game I had to play with an intentional feeder lol.... who kept telling me how worthless etc I was. I also was blamed for our mid dying 1v1 to which I said afterwards that it was in fact his fault ( really that bad an offense)
Game 3: This is beyond me. The only toxic thing I see is 3 min but everyone had bascially agreed on surrendering and was afking in base except for 1 person. People write this ALL the time in my games only I dont report because I am no whiny person wanting to see others have their accounts taken away.
Once again this got punished with permanent ban @ riot this isnt fair for all I had to listen to when playing my games. Its only natural you react to countless offenses at times and I did in an acceptable fashion, no deaththreats, homophobic offenses or even direct offenses besides me criticizing their plays. ( happens all the time not just in game also life that you get notified about your mistakes cmon lol)
If this is the end then so be it maybe this can serve as a warning for those who arent aware of how little an offense can lead to this level of ban.
* Edit , GAme 2s " I am glad youre losing lp" seems very toxic but I was playing with an Intfeeder who wanted me to lose my promo acting like he didnt care so I got somewhat mad.

You've had 6x 10-game chat restrictions, 4x 25-game chat restrictions, 2x 14-day bans, and FINALLY this perma-ban.

I'd say you were given plenty of chances. Yet, you continue to harass and blame your team in almost every game you play. This is unacceptable behavior.

You are responsible for your behavior, just as each person is responsible for theirs. If someone is harassing you or using hate-speech, report them after the game. It does not give you free reign to harass them. Additionally, when someone is performing poorly, it is not your duty to tell them how bad they are.

Frankly, I've never seen anyone with as many punishments as you on a single account before being perma-banned. Today I learned when a punishment record gets too long, I have to click on 'next page' to view more.

You very well know you have been offensive in your chat logs, and I'd be happy to post examples for you if you'd like.

The last was an illustration of just how many punishments you have received and how many chances you were given. I have been working on behavior systems for the last 5 years and I have not ever seen that many chances given. Arriving at a perma-ban should not have been any sort of surprise for you. 

Your punishment logs contain racism, unsportsmanship, constant blame, harassment, and many other colors which are deemed unacceptable by the community.

Every time you perform poorly, you claim the enemy is scripting. Every time a teammate does poorly, you blame them.

The other thing is that Riot takes your history into account. If you were just getting off of a chat restriction, and that report came in, the Rioter is going to think "Yup, this guy has learned nothing, punish 'em again." just because you have a history for negative chat.
